Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.name: Yahya ibn Zayd
Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Also known as Yahya al-Shaheed. He continued his father's rebellion and was martyred.

Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.name: Isa ibn Zayd
Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.name: Husayn ibn Zayd
Zayd_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Little is known about his life.
